010package imagingbook.pub.sift.scalespace;
011
012import java.io.PrintStream;
013
014import imagingbook.lib.util.PrintsToStream;
015
016public abstract class HierarchicalScaleSpace implements PrintsToStream {
017        
018        protected final int P;                                          // number of octaves
019        protected final int Q;                                          // number of levels per octave
020        protected final double sigma_s;                         // absolute scale of original image
021        protected final double sigma_0;                         // absolute base scale of first octave (level 0,0)
022        protected final int botLevel, topLevel;         // bottom and top level index in each octave
023        protected final ScaleOctave[] octaves;          
024        
025        protected HierarchicalScaleSpace(int P, int Q, double sigma_s, double sigma_0, int botLevel, int topLevel) {
026                this.Q = Q;
027                this.P = P;
028                this.sigma_s = sigma_s;
029                this.sigma_0 = sigma_0;
030                this.botLevel = botLevel;
031                this.topLevel = topLevel;
032                octaves = new ScaleOctave[P];   
033        }
034        
035        public int getP() {
036                return P;
037        }
038        
039        public int getQ() {
040                return Q;
041        }
042        
043        public double getSigma_s() {
044                return sigma_s;
045        }
046        
047        public double getSigma_0() {
048                return sigma_0;
049        }
050        
051        public ScaleOctave getOctave(int p) {
052                return octaves[p];
053        }
054        
055        public ScaleLevel getScaleLevel(int p, int q) {
056                return getOctave(p).getLevel(q);
057        }
058        
059//      public float getValue(int p, int q, int u, int v) {
060//              ScaleLevel level = getLevel(p,q);
061//              return level.getf(u, v);
062//      }
063        
064        public int getScaleIndex(int p, int q) {
065                int m = Q * p + q; 
066                return m;
067        }
068        
069        public float getScaleIndexFloat(float p, float q) {
070                float m = Q * p + q; 
071                return m;
072        }
073        
074        public double getAbsoluteScale(int p, float q) {
075                double m = Q * p + q;
076                return sigma_0 * Math.pow(2, m/Q);
077        }
078        
079        public double getRelativeScale(double scaleA, double scaleB) {  // scaleA <= scaleB
080                if (scaleA > scaleB) {
081                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("getRelativeScale(): scaleA > scaleB");
082                }
083                return Math.sqrt(scaleB*scaleB - scaleA*scaleA);
084        }
085        
086        /**
087         * Calculates and returns the real (unscaled) x-position for a
088         * local coordinate at the specified octave.
089         * 
090         * @param p the octave index
091         * @param xp the (scale-level) local coordinate
092         * @return the original x-position
093         */
094        public double getRealX(int p, double xp) {
095                return Math.pow(2, p) * xp;     // TODO: optimize (precalculate Math.pow(p, 2))
096        }
097        
098        /**
099         * Calculates and returns the real (unscaled) y-position for a
100         * local coordinate at the specified octave.
101         * 
102         * @param p the octave index
103         * @param yp the scale-level) local coordinate
104         * @return the original y-position
105         */
106        public double getRealY(int p, double yp) {
107                return Math.pow(2, p) * yp;
108        }
109        
110        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
111        
112        @Override
113        public void printToStream(PrintStream strm) {
114                strm.println("Hierarchical Scale Space (" + this.getClass().getSimpleName() + ")");
115                for (ScaleOctave oct : octaves) {
116                        oct.printToStream(strm);
117                        strm.println();
118                }
119        }
120        
121        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
122        
123        public void show() {
124                show("");
125        }
126        
127        public void show(String title) {
128                if (!title.isEmpty()) {
129                        title = title + ": ";
130                }
131                for (int p = 0; p < P; p++) {
132                        octaves[p].showAsStack(title + "Octave " + p);
133                }
134        }
135        
136}
